scenes.background: Monica takes a deep breath, trying to calm herself. Bob leans against the desk, waiting for a solution.
scenes.description: 'I need a bit more time to sort through these issues. Can we reconvene later?'

options.text: Sure, let's set a time to meet later and discuss the details.
options.analysis: You agreed to give Monica more time, showing good self-regulation while maintaining empathy and social skills.

options.text: We really need to handle this now. Can you manage with some support?
options.analysis: You insisted on an immediate solution, showing strong perception and empathy, but your self-regulation was lower as you pushed for urgency.

options.text: Bob, maybe we can give Monica some space to work through this.
options.analysis: You suggested giving Monica space, showing good social skills and self-regulation, but lower empathy and motivation to resolve the issue now.
